name: issue-dashboard-widgets
title: Issue Dashboard Widgets
description: A set of dashboard widgets that provide various issue views. The set includes widgets for viewing an issue list, an issue distribution report, an issue activity feed, or a due date calendar for issues.

widgets.name: Issue List
widgets.description: Displays a list of YouTrack issues that match a search query.

widgets.name: Issue Distribution Report
widgets.description: Displays a distribution report for YouTrack issues. The widget settings let you build the report directly on a dashboard or project overview page.

widgets.name: Due Date Calendar
widgets.description: Displays a calendar for the current list of issues that match a search query, saved search, project, or tag.

widgets.name: Issue Activity Feed
widgets.description: Shows activities in selected categories for issues that match the specified search criteria.
